text: Chad Lamont Butler, (December 19, 1973 â€” December 4, 2007) better known by his stage name Pimp C, was an American rapper and record producer best known for being a member of the duo UGK and creator of record label UGK Records. He died of an accidental drug overdose on 4 December 2007 at the age of 33.
